cu.explanation: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to loopback '127.0.0.1' will make NG-AMF interface unreachable, causing connection failure and system rejection.

du.explanation: Setting local_n_address to '10.0.0.1' (unreachable subnet) will cause F1 interface binding failure and DU-CU communication breakdown.
